titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: DISTANCE TO CLOSEST NON PERITONEALISED RESECTION MARGIN - Description

div.p: DISTANCE TO CLOSEST NON PERITONEALISED RESECTION MARGIN is the distance from the outer margin of the Tumour to the closest non peritonealised resection margin, where the UCUM UNIT OF MEASUREMENT is 'Millimetres (mm)' during a Colorectal Cancer Care Spell.
